content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace at position (46.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position (46.0, -82.0) that converts iron ore into iron plates.
- Wooden chest at position (47.5, -81.5) that collects the produced iron plates.
Updates:
- Steps 38–47: Produced and extracted multiple batches of iron plates with fuel and resource adjustments; experienced a temporary halt due to insufficient raw materials.
- Steps 48–49: 
   • Located and harvested an additional 10 iron ore from the patch at (-15.5, -50.5) and inserted them into the furnace.
   • Furnace inventory updated post-insertion to include 19 iron ore and 1 iron plate.
   • After waiting 10 seconds, inventory adjusted to 14 iron ore and 5 iron plates, with 5 iron plates subsequently extracted.
   • Final map state reports a furnace with 25 coal as fuel, an accumulated count of 15 iron plates in processing output, and a warning of "no ingredients to smelt" (indicating intermittent resource delays).

ERROR TIPS

### Errors due to insufficient resource availability and inventory mismanagement
- Confirm resource presence and necessary quantities in inventory before insertion into processing structures to prevent intermittent halts.

### Errors related to processing timing and ingredient replenishment delays
- Align waiting intervals with processing cycles. Monitor and replenish ingredients in a timely manner to avoid warnings such as "no ingredients to smelt".

### Repeated mistakes with stale entity status data
- Always update entity inventories and states after each operation to ensure that processing decisions are based on the most current map data.
